feed.title: Combined summary - Stackoverflow with latest git head

entry.title: Combined summary - Stackoverflow with latest git head
entry.summary: The information provided in the context revolves around a loop that Bitcoin is currently stuck in. The first bad commit has been identified as 3793fa09ff920fc720dfad3738f105d2c9563662 and the QT version being used is 4.6.2.The person providing this information offers to run any additional tests that may be necessary and has included their contact information for further communication. It is not clear what specific issue is causing the loop, but with this information, it may be possible for developers to identify and resolve the problem.Overall, this context provides important details about a technical issue with Bitcoin and the steps taken to identify the root cause. It highlights the importance of thorough testing and collaboration among developers to ensure the stability and functionality of complex systems like Bitcoin.
